text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram $ABOC$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $24$ units.
The length of the line $DO$ is $7$ units.
The length of the line $CO$ is $23$ units.
Point $O$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line $BD$ is perpendicular to the line $DO$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BO$, $CO$, $DO$, $BD$, and $CD$, forming the parallelogram and its diagonals.
